participant_1.background:
My musical tastes will make me more relatable to my co-workers at the bank.
i love to put a smile on people s faces.
I try to eat fast food less, but my favorite restaurant is a small cafe near my work.
I love to dye my hair pink, it's my favorite color!
i hope one day to own a stable of at least 10 race horses.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy long road trips and keeping my blood sugar in check.
i like to ride horses.
My car is a great place to enjoy my favorite barbecue recipes.
i do yoga on tuesdays.
i am from georgia.

content.text: What is your favorite way to relax?
I love to go on long road trips, it really helps me clear my head. Do you have any hobbies?
I love to sing and dance. I'm trying to get my hair to be pink! What kind of music do you like?
I love country music, and I do yoga every Tuesday. I'm from Georgia and I love barbecue.
That's so cool! I love to eat, but I'm trying to eat healthier. I love fast food, but it's not very good for you.
I hear you, it's hard to stay away from it. I don't eat fast food very often, but I really love barbecue.
What's your favorite part of Georgia? I've never been, but I've heard good things.
I love the mountains! And the food. I'm a big fan of fried chicken.
I love fried chicken too! I'm from California, so I'm not used to all the southern food.
You should come to Georgia and try some of the real southern barbecue. It's amazing!
I would love to! I've always wanted to go to Georgia.
You should! It's a great place to visit.
